add_ibm_cloud_internal_rules.name: add_ibm_cloud_internal_rules
add_ibm_cloud_internal_rules.description: Add IBM cloud Internal rules to the provided security group rules

existing_security_group_name.name: existing_security_group_name
existing_security_group_name.description: Name of the security group to be created

resource_group.name: resource_group
resource_group.description: An existing resource group name to use for this example, if unset a new resource group will be created

security_group_name.name: security_group_name
security_group_name.description: Name of the security group to be created

security_group_rules.name: security_group_rules
security_group_rules.description: A list of security group rules to be added to the default vpc security group

target_ids.name: target_ids
target_ids.description: (Optional) A list of target identifiers from the same VPC as the security group. It may contain one or more of the following identifiers: network interface, application load balancer, endpoint gateway, and VPN server

vpc_id.name: vpc_id
vpc_id.description: ID of the VPC to create security group. Only required if 'existing_security_group_name' is null

id.name: id
id.description: The ID of the security group where the rules are added

security_group_id.name: security_group_id
security_group_id.description: The ID of the security group where the rules are added

security_target.name: security_target
security_target.description: Resources added to the security group
